budget-line.narrative: The unforeseen expenses are 5% of the budgeted expenses.
This line included the communications budget, the impact assessment, consultants and other external services.
This line includes bank charges and other financial service fees.

budget-line.ref: Depreciation of plant, property and equipment
budget-line.narrative: This line includes depreciation of office furniture, laptops and other equipment
This line includes office rent and other office costs (service charges, cleaning, maintenance etc.)
This line includes salaries, social contributions, professional development, public transport to the office etc.
This line includes staff travel expenses (presentations, meetings, stakeholder consultation etc.) and in-person meetings of the Supervisory Board and Expert Review Committee
This line includes the datamanagement system, ICT, office supplies and similar expenses.
This line includes bank charges and other financial service fees.
